tagline: Developmental, line, and copy editing that makes writing work — for the reader, every time
pros: Three-level editing (structure, voice, copy) in one role
Preserves writer's voice while improving craft
Feedback that teaches, not just fixes
cons: Firm standards can create friction with writers who resist edits

model_recommendations.notes: Prioritizes voice, tone, and creative quality over analytical depth. Thinking/reasoning can hurt creative output — keep low or off.
